p.d: A special programme with the viewers' 40 favourite songs. 40 exceptional performances that blend the voices of some of the greatest stars of song, with those of the finest French choirs. Guests: Calogero, Roberto Alagna, Soprano, Patricia Kaas, Slimane, Julien Clerc, Kendji Girac, Nolwenn Leroy, Marc Lavoine, Vianney, Mr Pokora, Alain Souchon, Seal, Laurent Voulzy, Jenifer, Vincent Niclo, Pascal Obispo, Isabelle Boulay, Amel Bent, Sylvie Vartan... Directed by: Lionel Chabert, Richard Michel (France, 2019)
